long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a private extension that will give Fayie readers notification when a new post/blog or guide has been posted. This will be constantly maintained to ensure security is maintained.  A simple notification balloon will pop up when a new post has been added similiar to when you have new windows notifications in Windows 10. While clicking the balloon will open a new window on your chrome browser pointing to the latest post.
